definition: a steep nose-down descent by an aircraft, swim under water
details:
noun
- a steep nose-down descent by an aircraft
= synonyms: nose dive, nosedive
- a headlong plunge into water
= synonyms: diving
- a cheap disreputable nightclub or dance hall
= synonyms: honkytonk
verb
- swim under water
- plunge into water
= example: plunge into water
- drop steeply
= synonyms: plunk, plunge
